full_summary:
### Teaching Services Request for Proposal

#### Solicitation Details

| Date        | Description                      | English      | French      |
|-------------|----------------------------------|--------------|--------------|
| 18/04/2023 | Solicitation Publication Date     | Apr 18, 2023 | 18 avr. 2023 |
| 16/05/2023 | Tender Closing Date              | May 16, 2023  | 16 mai 2023   |

#### Contract Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: 01 Aug 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 Aug 2025
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Service Description

* Acquisition of academic services including training and management of student records located in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.

#### Selection Criteria

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Procurement Method

* Competitive Open Bidding

#### Contact Information

* Montpetit, Philippe (SPAC/PSPC)
* philippe.montpetit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* [link to notice](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16031492?extsite=MTYwMzE0OTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
